## Pre-Commit

### Config

-   [ ] Create a` .pre-commit-config.yaml` in root of repository.
-   [ ] Commit `yaml` repository.
-   [ ] Prepare for run by adding hook's
    -   [ ] Repository: `- repo: {url}`:
    -   [ ] Revision: `rev` : `    `
        -   [ ] v
        -   Select/Use the ref you want to point at
    -   [ ] Hooks:
        -   [ ] Id: `id {hook-ident}`
